name: Swizzle 100% Self-Striping Sock Yarn
description:
This self-striping superwash merino and nylon sock yarn is 100% merino wool so it is super soft and squishy. It is a 2-ply fingering weight with a nice firm, plump twist, perfect for a beautiful pair of stripey socks, mittens, hat or other small project. It is machine washable, but handwashing is recommended for all your projects.


Available colorways are:
Sterling Cooper
   ~black, charcoal gray, slate gray
It's Jess!
   ~black, pale yellow, sky blue
Almost Famous
   ~black, teal, vibrant purple

This is a self-striping yarn and will knit in approximately six rows main color stripe, two rows skinny stripe, four rows medium stripe, two rows skinny stripe and then repeat, depending on gauge. 

100% superwash merino wool, fingering yarn
100 gram skein, 400 yards
Gauge: 7-8 st = 1" on US 1-3

Custom requests are accepted, based on availability. E-mail kory@culturepopstudio.com for custom requests.

Skeins pictured are representative of the colorways. Colors may vary, as these are hand dyed skeins.

Shipping is via US First Class or Priority Mail.

name: Sublime Self-Striping Sock Yarn
description:
This self-striping superwash merino and nylon sock yarn is 75% merino wool/25% nylon and is perfect for a beautiful pair of stripey socks, mittens, hat or other small project. It is machine washable, but handwashing is recommended for all your projects.

Available colorways are:
Rock It Retro
   ~black, lime green, magenta
Sterling Cooper
   ~black, charcoal gray, slate gray
The Night Before Christmas
   ~black, kelly green, Christmas red
It's Jess!
   ~black, pale yellow, sky blue
(please see the listing for Swizzle 100% for a photo of Sterling Cooper)

This is a self-striping yarn and will knit in approximately six rows main color stripe, two rows skinny stripe, four rows medium stripe, two rows skinny stripe and then repeat, depending on gauge. 

75% superwash merino wool, 25% nylon sock/fingering yarn
100 gram skein, 460 yards
Gauge: 7-8 st = 1" on US 1-3

Skeins pictured are representative of the colorways. Colors may vary, as these are hand dyed skeins.

Shipping is via US First Class or Priority Mail.
